name: Cube 'n' Run
description:
Hey,

I just coded my first video game!

Controls:

Space    -    Jump

A/D   -    Go left/right

Q/W/E/S    -    Switch Perspective

M    -    Mute Sound

F    -    Zoom

Esc    -    Pause the game

Credits:

Explosion- , Click- and  Jumping-Sound:

ZapSplat - Download Free Sound Effects & Royalty Free Music

If there is an impossible jump, just restart the game.
